oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Agricultural knowledge and innovation systems towards 2020 - an orientation paper on linking innovation and research
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Elaborates on how to use the agricultural knowledge and innovation systems framework to promote innovation at different levels with special focus on European issues related to the implementation f Horizon 2020. It is of value as a conceptual and methodological reference
